## Patent 1

### Abstract

A method for capturing carbon dioxide from a flue gas stream is provided. The method includes contacting the flue gas stream with a sorbent to capture carbon dioxide from the flue gas stream. The sorbent includes a sorbent material and a catalyst. The sorbent material includes a metal oxide. The catalyst includes a metal oxide.
